name: Wheat Make Dark the Night
description:
The simple farmer must contend with the light of an ever-changing city skyline.

Harvest wheat while leaving enough behind to block out the light pollution from the city skyline.

Controls:

Click to cut wheat. Cut the wheat to match the shape of the skyline!

Note: The render texture issue is still kind of a problem. The light detection is currently working, but it is always about 7% short on coverage. This is a pretty big handicap, so if you lose this game, it is my fault.
